alert.note: Alert for Coles; Douglas; Moultrie; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 9:17AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Coles, northeastern Christian, Moultrie, northeastern Shelby, southern Piatt, southwestern Champaign, western Douglas and south central Macon Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 917 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Long Creek, or 9 miles southeast of Decatur, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bethany, Lovington and Hammond around 925 AM CDT. Sullivan around 930 AM CDT. Arthur around 935 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Allenville and Cooks Mill. This includes Interstate 57 between mile markers 207 and 209, and between mile markers 212 and 217. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
